title: "Sunglasses are an important accessory for reducing damage from the sun"
body:
> Sunglasses are an important accessory for ~~reducing damage from~~ [praising] the sun [in style]

{{champion:89}} "ftfy, Riot. p.s. GIVE ME MY SECRET AGENT SKIN, \*\*\*\*IT!!!"

replies.body: Excuse me, do you have a moment to talk about our lord and savior, Pelor?
